title: Manage Haul Road Dust Suppression
description: An environmental officer manages the water trucks to ensure haul roads are kept damp to suppress dust.

tasks.description: Review the data from the fixed dust monitors around the mine site.
tasks.expected_outcome: The data shows that dust levels on the main haul road are increasing.

tasks.description: Check the location of the water trucks in the Fleet Management System.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system shows no water truck has been on the main haul road for the last hour.

tasks.description: Dispatch a water truck to the main haul road to spray it with water.
tasks.expected_outcome: A water truck is dispatched, and subsequent dust monitor readings show levels have decreased.
